short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture your web tests and add them to your iLTAF account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The iLTAF (IdeyaLabs Test Automation Framework) Extension by IdeyaLabs is designed to simplify the automation testing process by recording user actions and seamlessly converting them into structured test steps. This tool provides testers and developers with an intuitive interface to capture interactions within the application, generating ready-to-use test cases without manual scripting.

By integrating action recording with step conversion, iLTAF enhances efficiency, making it ideal for low-code automation projects. It supports precise, consistent test creation, offering organizations a powerful solution for achieving scalable, repeatable, and reliable test automation.
